are not highlighted.Table of Benefits  – First & Family Plan
Applicable to new registrations or renewals on/or after 1st March, 2020.
This Table  of Benefits  must  be read in conjunction  with your Hospital  Plan Terms  and Conditions 
and the directories of approved facilities. Facilities may change from time to time, so log on to 
Vhi.ie or  phone us  on (056) 444 4444  if you are planning treatment.
~

screen

costs

costs
 Annual excess - per  member, per year €1

* These  benefits are not subject to the annual excess or annual maximum
Vhi Healthcare  DAC  trading  as Vhi Healthcare is regulated by  the Central  Bank of Ireland. Vhi 
Healthcare is tied to  Vhi Insurance  DAC for health insurance in Ireland which is underwritten by 
Vhi Insurance  DAC.
